content: List 25 adjectives that start with the letter B.

I'd be happy to help you with that! Here are 25 adjectives that start with the letter B:

1. Beautiful
2. Brave
3. Bright
4. Brilliant
5. Breezy
6. Busy
7. Bold
8. Bossy
9. Bubbly
10. Bulky
11. Bumpy
12. Burly
13. Buzzy
14. Bashful
15. Basic
16. Batshit
17. Bawdy
18. Beady
19. Beaming
20. Beastly
21. Beaten
22. Beaten-up
23. Beaten-down
24. Bearish
25. Beatable

I hope this helps! Let me know if you need any more assistance.
